Description: Tier of data, whereby Tier 1 indicates values to represent the world and Tier 2 indicated values to represent countries
Units: Character

Description: Region values represent
Units: Character

Description: Country name based on UN standard English categories
Units: Character

Description: Three letter ISO3 UN code to signify country or region
Units: Character

Description: Item (crop) name as per UN FAO standards
Units: Character

Description: Item (crop) code as per UN FAO standards
Units: Numeric, integer

Description: Item group (crop) code as per UN FAO standards
Units: Numeric, integer

Description: Crop component defined as either 'Crop_products' or 'Crop_residues'
Units: Character

Description: Dry matter percentage of fresh weight
Units: Dry matter as a percentage of fresh weight

Description: Harvest index
Units: Harvest index as proportion of above ground biomass as crop products

Description: Nitrogen concentration on a dry matter basis
Units: Nitrogen as a percentage of dry matter

Description: Elemental phosphorus concentration on a dry matter basis
Units: Elemental phosphorus as a percentage of dry matter

Description: Elemental potassium concentration on a dry matter basis
Units: Elemental potassium as a percentage of dry matter

Description: Elemental sulphur concentration on a dry matter basis
Units: Elemental sulphur as a percentage of dry matter

Description: Nitrogen concentration on a fresh weight basis
Units: Nitrogen as a percentage of fresh weight

Description: Elemental phosphorus concentration on a fresh weight basis
Units: Elemental phosphorus as a percentage of fresh weight

Description: Elemental potassium concentration on a fresh weight basis
Units: Elemental potassium as a percentage of fresh weight

Description: Elemental sulphur concentration on a fresh weight basis
Units: Elemental sulphur as a percentage of fresh weight

Description: Nitrogen concentration on a fresh weight basis-per metric tonne
Units: Nitrogen in kilograms per metric tonne of fresh weight

Description: Elemental phosphorus concentration on a fresh weight basis-per metric tonne
Units: Elemental phosphorus in kilograms per metric tonne of fresh weight

Description: Elemental potassium concentration on a fresh weight basis-per metric tonne
Units: Elemental potassium in kilograms per metric tonne of fresh weight

Description: Elemental sulphur concentration on a fresh weight basis-per metric tonne
Units: Elemental sulphur in kilograms per metric tonne of fresh weight
